description: Step into a world of extraordinary possibilities with the Redmi 13C – a smartphone that blends unmatched technology with creative brilliance. From capturing memories with artistic finesse to delivering immersive entertainment and powering through tasks effortlessly, this device is designed to complement your dynamic lifestyle. Redefine your smartphone experience with the Redmi 13C, where innovation meets imagination, and every feature is crafted to enhance your digital journey.
highlights: 4 GB RAM | 128 GB ROM | Expandable Upto 1 TB, 17.12 cm (6.74 inch) HD+ Display, 50MP Rear Camera | 8MP Front Camera, 5000 mAh Battery, Helio G85 Processor

product_desc.name: 50 MP AI Triple Camera
product_desc.desc: The Redmi 13C takes your photography to new heights with its 50 MP AI Triple Camera. Immerse your images in a vintage vibe, courtesy of the 7 classic film filters. Every snapshot becomes a timeless masterpiece, capturing the essence of the moment in rich detail and artistic flair.

product_desc.name: Dazzling Display
product_desc.desc: Dive into a world of cinematic bliss with the 17.11 cm (6.74) display of the Redmi 13C. Whether you're gaming, streaming, or simply browsing, the immersive display ensures a visual treat. Redefine your entertainment experience as games come to life with smoothness, thanks to the 90 Hz refresh rate that sets the stage for dynamic and responsive gameplay.

product_desc.name: Powerful Performance
product_desc.desc: Experience seamless multitasking like never before, courtesy of the fast MediaTek G85 Octa-Core Processor. Paired with a whopping 4 GB of RAM and a vast 128 GB of UFS 2.2 storage, the Redmi 13C transforms every task into a breeze. Say goodbye to lag and hello to efficiency as you navigate through applications, games, and multimedia effortlessly.

product_desc.name: All Day Battery
product_desc.desc: Fuel your day with the robust 5000 mAh Battery of the Redmi 13C. Whether you're a power user or a casual smartphone enthusiast, this device keeps up with your pace. Bid farewell to battery anxiety, and embrace the freedom to go through your day without worrying about running out of charge. The 18 W fast charging capability ensures a quick boost whenever needed.

product_desc.name: Durability Redefined
product_desc.desc: Life is unpredictable, but your smartphone doesn't have to be. The Redmi 13C stands tall against everyday wear and tear, thanks to the robust Corning Gorilla Glass protecting its display. With splash and dust resistance, this phone becomes your reliable companion in any environment – be it a bustling city or an adventurous outdoor escapade.

product_desc.name: Quick Unlock Fingerprint Scanner
product_desc.desc: Security meets convenience with the Quick Unlock Fingerprint scanner of the Redmi 13C. Your smartphone is not just a device; it's an extension of yourself, secured by the unique imprint of your fingerprint. Access your world swiftly and securely, knowing that your privacy is in safe hands.

title: REDMI 13C (Starfrost White, 128 GB)  (4 GB RAM)

description: Smooth 5G connectivity is provided by the Redmi 13C 5G, allowing you lag-free video calls and streaming. Its striking Star Trail Design makes sure that you are seen. With the 50 MP AI Camera, take breathtaking pictures and infuse them with nostalgia through vintage film filters. With a refresh rate of 90 Hz, the 17.11 cm (6.74) display offers an immersive viewing experience. With the help of the Dimensity 6100+, it operates really quickly. You won't run out of space with 256 GB of extendable storage and up to 16 GB of RAM. Your phone is always fully charged thanks to the 18 W fast charging and 5000 mAh battery, and it is safe and convenient to use thanks to the Quick Unlock Fingerprint Scanner.
highlights: 4 GB RAM | 128 GB ROM | Expandable Upto 1 TB, 17.12 cm (6.74 inch) HD+ Display, 50MP Rear Camera | 5MP Front Camera, 5000 mAh Battery, Mediatek Dimensity 6100+ Processor

product_desc.name: 5G At Your Fingertips
product_desc.desc: Use the Redmi 13C 5G to fully experience the power of a 5G connection. Thanks to this innovative technology, you can watch cricket matches, view YouTube videos, and conduct video chats without experiencing any latency. 5G speed lets you stay connected and enjoy flawless streaming and browsing experiences no matter where you are, so say goodbye to buffering and delayed downloads.

product_desc.name: Star Trail Design
product_desc.desc: The Redmi 13C 5G's breathtaking Star Trail Design, stand out from the crowd. You will always be the centre of attention thanks to its striking design. When light falls on the phone, the distinctive design comes to life and gives the impression of star trails, which adds a touch of refinement and elegance. With a phone that looks as good as it works, you can move quickly and stylishly.

product_desc.name: 50 MP AI Camera with Classic Film Filters
product_desc.desc: Enjoy every moment in breathtaking detail thanks to the Redmi 13C 5G's 50 MP AI Camera. This strong camera makes sure that your pictures are crisp and colourful day or night. Your picture is improved by the AI's ability to automatically modify settings to suit varying lighting situations. You may also give your images a vintage feel with the classic film filters, which give you the creative control to guide your own memories.

product_desc.name: 90 Hz Smooth 17.11 cm (6.74) Display
product_desc.desc: Enjoy your favourite material to the fullest on the Redmi 13C 5G's expansive 17.11 cm (6.74) display. This large screen makes for an engrossing visual experience, making it ideal for watching films, TV series, and videos. Every game you play will run smoothly at a refresh rate of 90 Hz, giving you a competitive advantage with quicker, more responsive gaming. Take enjoyment in vibrant images and seamless transitions that enhance every phone connection.

product_desc.name: Win at Everything with Dimensity 6100+
product_desc.desc: The Dimensity 6100+ CPU, which powers the Redmi 13C 5G, offers lightning-fast performance. This CPU manages everything with ease, whether you're multitasking between applications, browsing social media, or playing graphics-intensive games. Take advantage of lag-free, efficient performance that enables you to do more. With the Dimensity 6100+, your phone will always be prepared to keep up with your hectic schedule.

product_desc.name: Up to 16 GB RAM and 256 GB UFS 2.2 Storage
product_desc.desc: With the Redmi 13C 5G, you never have to worry about running out of space. Up to 16 GB of RAM makes multitasking fluid and makes it easy to switch between programmes. You have plenty of room on the 256 GB UFS 2.2 storage to keep all of your files, including movies and memories. Additionally, you can increase storage up to 1 TB via the dedicated SIM card, so you'll always have enough room for your digital life.

product_desc.name: Be 5G Fast and Look Good All Day Long
product_desc.desc: The Redmi 13C 5G boasts endurance in addition to quickness. With a 5000 mAh battery, you can continue through the day without worrying about needing to recharge frequently since you will always be charged up. With the 18 W rapid charging (10 W charger that comes in the package), you can refuel your phone fast and resume your favourite activities. Maintain your connection and take full most of your smartphone experience.

product_desc.name: Quick Unlock Fingerprint Scanner
product_desc.desc: The Redmi 13C 5G's Quick Unlock Fingerprint Scanner combines security and ease of use. With this function, you can be confident that your phone is always private and only available to you. You may quickly and securely unlock your phone with a single touch, protecting your sensitive data and providing you with peace of mind.

product_desc.desc: The Dimensity 6100+ CPU, which powers the Redmi 13C 5G, offers lightning-fast performance. This CPU manages everything with ease, whether you're multitasking between applications, browsing social media, or playing graphics-intensive games. Take advantage of lag-free, efficient performance that enables you to do more. With the Dimensity 6100+, your phone will always be prepared to keep up with your hectic schedule.

product_desc.name: Up to 16 GB RAM and 256 GB UFS 2.2 Storage
product_desc.desc: With the Redmi 13C 5G, you never have to worry about running out of space. Up to 16 GB of RAM makes multitasking fluid and makes it easy to switch between programmes. You have plenty of room on the 256 GB UFS 2.2 storage to keep all of your files, including movies and memories. Additionally, you can increase storage up to 1 TB via the dedicated SIM card, so you'll always have enough room for your digital life.

product_desc.name: Be 5G Fast and Look Good All Day Long
product_desc.desc: The Redmi 13C 5G boasts endurance in addition to quickness. With a 5000 mAh battery, you can continue through the day without worrying about needing to recharge frequently since you will always be charged up. With the 18 W rapid charging (10 W charger that comes in the package), you can refuel your phone fast and resume your favourite activities. Maintain your connection and take full most of your smartphone experience.

product_desc.name: Quick Unlock Fingerprint Scanner
product_desc.desc: The Redmi 13C 5G's Quick Unlock Fingerprint Scanner combines security and ease of use. With this function, you can be confident that your phone is always private and only available to you. You may quickly and securely unlock your phone with a single touch, protecting your sensitive data and providing you with peace of mind.

description: Step into a world of extraordinary possibilities with the Redmi 13C – a smartphone that blends unmatched technology with creative brilliance. From capturing memories with artistic finesse to delivering immersive entertainment and powering through tasks effortlessly, this device is designed to complement your dynamic lifestyle. Redefine your smartphone experience with the Redmi 13C, where innovation meets imagination, and every feature is crafted to enhance your digital journey.
highlights: 6 GB RAM | 128 GB ROM | Expandable Upto 1 TB, 17.12 cm (6.74 inch) HD+ Display, 50MP Rear Camera | 8MP Front Camera, 5000 mAh Battery, Helio G85 Processor

product_desc.name: 50 MP AI Triple Camera
product_desc.desc: The Redmi 13C takes your photography to new heights with its 50 MP AI Triple Camera. Immerse your images in a vintage vibe, courtesy of the 7 classic film filters. Every snapshot becomes a timeless masterpiece, capturing the essence of the moment in rich detail and artistic flair.

product_desc.name: Dazzling Display
product_desc.desc: Dive into a world of cinematic bliss with the 17.11 cm (6.74) display of the Redmi 13C. Whether you're gaming, streaming, or simply browsing, the immersive display ensures a visual treat. Redefine your entertainment experience as games come to life with smoothness, thanks to the 90 Hz refresh rate that sets the stage for dynamic and responsive gameplay.

product_desc.name: Powerful Performance
product_desc.desc: Experience seamless multitasking like never before, courtesy of the fast MediaTek G85 Octa-Core Processor. Paired with a whopping 6 GB of RAM and a vast 128 GB of UFS 2.2 storage, the Redmi 13C transforms every task into a breeze. Say goodbye to lag and hello to efficiency as you navigate through applications, games, and multimedia effortlessly.

product_desc.name: All Day Battery
product_desc.desc: Fuel your day with the robust 5000 mAh Battery of the Redmi 13C. Whether you're a power user or a casual smartphone enthusiast, this device keeps up with your pace. Bid farewell to battery anxiety, and embrace the freedom to go through your day without worrying about running out of charge. The 18 W fast charging capability ensures a quick boost whenever needed.

product_desc.name: Durability Redefined
product_desc.desc: Life is unpredictable, but your smartphone doesn't have to be. The Redmi 13C stands tall against everyday wear and tear, thanks to the robust Corning Gorilla Glass protecting its display. With splash and dust resistance, this phone becomes your reliable companion in any environment – be it a bustling city or an adventurous outdoor escapade.

product_desc.name: Quick Unlock Fingerprint Scanner
product_desc.desc: Security meets convenience with the Quick Unlock Fingerprint scanner of the Redmi 13C. Your smartphone is not just a device; it's an extension of yourself, secured by the unique imprint of your fingerprint. Access your world swiftly and securely, knowing that your privacy is in safe hands.

title: REDMI 12 5G (Pastel Blue, 256 GB)  (8 GB RAM)

highlights: 8 GB RAM | 256 GB ROM, 16.94 cm (6.67 inch) Display, 200MP (OIS) + 8MP + 2MP | 16MP Front Camera, 5000 mAh Battery, Dimensity 7200 Ultra 5G Processor

product_desc.name: Fusion Design
product_desc.desc: Feel the opulence with the all-new Fusion Design on the SuperNote. Immerse yourself in the stunning vegan leather texture paired with a stylish colour-blocked pattern that elevates the aesthetics of the Redmi Note series to unparalleled heights. It's not just a smartphone; it's a fashion statement that mirrors your sense of style.

product_desc.name: 3D Curved AMOLED Display
product_desc.desc: Witness innovation unfolds with the introduction of the first-ever 3D curved display on the Redmi Note series. The 4-sided ultra-thin narrow bezel and a 25-degree curvature not only enhance the visual appeal but are meticulously designed for the perfect hand grip. Immerse yourself in a display that doesn't just meet expectations; it exceeds them.

product_desc.name: In-display Fingerprint Sensor
product_desc.desc: Experience the marriage of security and style with Redmi Note's first in-display fingerprint sensor. This cutting-edge technology supports dark light unlocking and heart rate detection, ensuring that unlocking your device is not just secure but seamless. It's a touch of sophistication every time you access your smartphone.

product_desc.name: Sharp 1.5K Resolution
product_desc.desc: Elevate your visual experience with the Redmi Note 13 Pro+ 5G's impressive 120Hz 1.5K resolution. Compared to a standard FHD display, this technology provides a much denser pixel-per-inch ratio, resulting in a sharper, visually pleasing experience. Immerse yourself in a world of clarity and vividness like never before.

product_desc.name: Flagship IP68 Protection
product_desc.desc: Fearlessly face the elements with the Redmi Note 13 Pro+ 5G's flagship IP68 protection. With 19 key structural components water-proofed, this smartphone reaches pro-grade protection against water and dust. Life's uncertainties are no match for the SuperNote – it's ready for whatever challenges come your way.

product_desc.name: Elegance Meets Endurance
product_desc.desc: The curved display on the SuperNote is not just a visual treat; it's fortified with Corning Gorilla(R) Glass Victus(R), the toughest Gorilla(R) Glass yet. This makes the SuperNote twice as scratch-resistant as its predecessor, ensuring enduring elegance that stands the test of time.

product_desc.name: True 200MP With OIS
product_desc.desc: The new and improved flagship 200MP ISOCELL HP3 with in-sensor 4X zoom and enhanced computing power gives you a flagship imaging experience, further enhancing the high-resolution experience.

product_desc.name: 120 W HyperCharge
product_desc.desc: Fuel your day at the speed of thought with the SuperNote's 120 W HyperCharge. Witness a 100% charge in just 19 minutes. But it's not just about speed; it's about intelligent charging. Redmi's own smart charging engine optimises the charging process, ensuring efficiency and longevity for your device.

product_desc.name: Powered by MediaTek Dimensity 7200 Ultra-5G
product_desc.desc: Step into the future with the smartphone powered by the MediaTek Dimensity 7200 Ultra-5G. Built on the flagship TSMC 4 nm process, the octa-core processor offers an improved performance. The SuperNote is not just powerful; it's cool too, thanks to advanced liquid cooling ensuring smooth operations even in demanding situations.

title: REDMI Note 13 Pro+ 5G (Fusion Black, 256 GB)  (8 GB RAM)

description: Discover the Redmi Note 13 5G, a smartphone that raises the bar on performance. Enjoy a visual feast with its breathtaking 16.94 cm AMOLED display and slim bezel. Take pleasure in fluid interactions on the incredibly smooth 120 Hz screen, which is complemented by the slimmest Redmi Note to date with a 7.6 mm profile. Durability is guaranteed with Corning Gorilla Glass 5, which is enhanced with an IP54 grade for further security. With the 108 MP triple camera configuration, you can capture every moment. The MediaTek Dimensity 6080 CPU powers lightning-fast 5G performance. Stays charged all day with a 5000 mAh battery and 33 W quick charging. Experience mobile at its finest with the Redmi Note 13 5G, where innovation and quality collide.
highlights: 6 GB RAM | 128 GB ROM | Expandable Upto 1 TB, 16.94 cm (6.67 inch) Full HD+ Display, 108MP + 2MP | 16MP Front Camera, 5000 mAh Battery, Dimensity 6080 Processor

product_desc.name: Narrow Bezel
product_desc.desc: The days of having your vision obscured by a big bezel are long gone. The Redmi Note 13 5G immerses you in every moment, whether you're streaming your favourite programme or conquering a new mobile game, thanks to its amazing 93.3% screen-to-body ratio. Envision being engrossed in the activity, with nothing to divert your attention from the striking spectacle in front of you.

product_desc.name: AMOLED Display
product_desc.desc: The captivating images on the Redmi Note 13 5G's 16.94 cm (6.67) AMOLED display will enthral you. The very small bezel guarantee that every scene is rendered with unmatched depth and clarity. The AMOLED technology provides an absolutely amazing experience, whether you're exploring a virtual world or binge-watching your favourite series. Additionally, you can navigate precisely even with moist fingertips from an unexpected downpour or a refreshing drink thanks to optimised touch recognition.

product_desc.name: Seamless Visuals
product_desc.desc: The ultra-smooth 120 Hz display of the Redmi Note 13 5G combines elegance with smoothness. The high refresh rate ensures that every swipe, scroll, and press is silky smooth. Say goodbye to jerky animations and sluggish transitions. The 120 Hz display makes sure that every interaction is smooth and seamless, whether you're playing intense games or multitasking like a pro.

product_desc.name: Sleek Design
product_desc.desc: With its newfound slimness, reduced weight, and elegant design, the Redmi Note 13 5G is a real featherweight champion. Its sleek profile and ergonomic design defy expectations, weighing only 173.5 g and measuring just 7.6 mm thin. Whether you hold it in your hand or slip it into your pocket, you'll be grateful for its smoothness every time you reach for it.

product_desc.name: Corning Gorilla Glass 5
product_desc.desc: Although accidents may happen, the display of your Redmi Note 13 5G is always safe with Corning Gorilla Glass 5. Bid farewell to the unsightly cracks and scratches - this very resilient glass is designed to endure the stresses of regular usage, giving you peace of mind that your screen is secure.

product_desc.name: Super 108 MP Camera
product_desc.desc: With the Redmi Note 13 5G's 108 MP triple camera configuration, you can capture every moment in breathtaking detail. Every picture, whether it's a candid portrait or an amazing scenery, has the potential to be a masterpiece. Furthermore, you can zoom in without sacrificing clarity thanks to the 3X in-sensor zoom, guaranteeing that every detail is captured for future generations.

product_desc.name: Blazing-fast 5G Performance
product_desc.desc: With the lightning-fast speed of the Redmi Note 13 5G, discover the power of 5G. Unmatched speed and responsiveness are provided by the MediaTek Dimensity 6080 CPU, whether you're streaming, gaming, or multitasking. Additionally, you can make use of all the advantages of 5G without compromising battery life thanks to MediaTek 5G UltraSave technology. This puts the best of both worlds right at your fingertips.

product_desc.name: Powerful Battery
product_desc.desc: With its 5000 mAh battery and 33 W rapid charging, the Redmi Note 13 5G combines power and ease. You can quickly replenish your battery with rapid charging and resume your favourite activities. Additionally, you won't ever have to worry about running out of power because of the enormous 5000 mAh capacity.

title: REDMI 13 5G (Hawaiian Blue, 128 GB)  (6 GB RAM)

description: This Redmi 12 is a smartphone with various advantages. It comes with 128 GB of storage that can be expanded up to 1 TB, as well as 12 GB of RAM that helps to run the phone seamlessly. This phone is IP53 rated and has Corning Gorilla glass which makes the phone highly durable. It is powered by a MediaTek G88 processor that helps enhance the overall performance. The crystal clear50 MP camera lets you capture incredible photos and videos. With an exquisite glass finish, MIUI Dialer, and a powerful 5000 mAh battery, this phone lets you stay productive all the time.
highlights: 6 GB RAM | 128 GB ROM | Expandable Upto 1 TB, 17.25 cm (6.79 inch) Full HD+ Display, 50MP + 8MP + 2MP | 8MP Front Camera, 5000 mAh Battery, Helio G88 Processor

product_desc.name: Premium Glass Finish
product_desc.desc: This phone boasts a crystal glass design and is just 8.17 mm thin.. The exquisite crystal glass design makes the phone look classy and attractive.

product_desc.name: 5000 mAh Enormous Battery
product_desc.desc: Watch uninterrupted entertainment anywhere without the worry about a draining battery as this phone is powered by a large 5000 mAh battery. The 18 W fast charger available along with this device ensures you stay connected with your closed ones.

product_desc.name: Crystal Clear Camera
product_desc.desc: This phone is crafted with awesome camera features that can click stunning images. The 50 MP AI Triple Camera vividly captures tiniest details while the 8 MP ultra-wide camera helps take amazing portraits of landscapes. You also have film filter options and vintage frames to beautify your clicks.

product_desc.name: Immersive FHD+ Display
product_desc.desc: Featuring a large 17.2 cm (6.79) FHD+ Display, you will cherish your screen time whether it is for playing games, watching shows or studying. The 90 Hz Adaptive Sync Refresh rate loads content super quick, thus offering you joyous screen time that is captivating.

product_desc.name: Powerful MediaTek Processor
product_desc.desc: Powered by a dominant MediaTek Helio G88 processor, you can enjoy a quick and lag-free experience. Play endless games, watch uninterrupted movies, shows and browse incessantly as the processor works swiftly and smoothly.

product_desc.name: Highly Durable
product_desc.desc: This smartphone is built to be durable in spite of rugged usage. Its IP53-rated design makes it dust and splash proof. You also have the Corning Gorilla glass that makes this phone further tough and durable.

product_desc.name: Massive Storage
product_desc.desc: Available with 12GB of RAM, experience a seamless navigation and use a multitude of applications effortlessly. With an ample storage capacity of 128 GB which can be further expanded up to 1 TB, you can stockpile vast amounts of data and media files.

product_desc.name: MIUI Dialer
product_desc.desc: Calling is made easy with the MIUI Dialer. Experience swift dialling with the addition of the new MIUI Dialer.
